creator: stephanie.bodoff@sun.com
text:
A jsp:setProperty element whose opening bracket is missing, for example

	jsp:setProperty name="aBean" property="*" />

is not detected and flagged during compilation. The page is compiled without
error and the setProperty action is not performed. In my example, the
setProperty element was nested in a useBean element.

creator: justyna.horwat@sun.com
text:
The opening bracket differentiates plain text and jsp elements. Without the
opening bracket, the text is accepted as is. For validation, you can use a
validating parser with an xml document.
